data.name: Real VR Fishing
data.detailed_description:
ğŸ£ Dive into the Ultimate Real VR Fishing Experience!

Explore stunningly realistic environments with Real VR Fishing. Relax in 40 beautiful maps and expand your adventure with DLC packs, unlocking 95 fishing locations. Discover 150+ fish species in the base game and over 300 species with DLC content. Whether youâ€™re a seasoned angler or a beginner, enjoy the peaceful ambiance and improve your skills.

ğŸ‘¥ Solo or Multiplayer (Up to 4 Players)

Fish alone or join friends in multiplayer. Share the thrill, chat in real-time, and enjoy fishing together. Real VR Fishing is more than a gameâ€”itâ€™s a space to bond and unwind.

ğŸ† Award-Winning & Constantly Updated

Voted Facebook Oculus Game of the Year 2019, Real VR Fishing offers monthly updates and seasonal events, adding new challenges and fish to catch.

âœ¨ Customize, Progress, and Master Fishing

Level up, unlock rare fish, and customize your avatar and aquarium. Whether you start in Normal Mode or aim for Expert Mode, find new ways to enjoy VR fishing.

ğŸ§ Fish, Stream, and Multitask

Listen to music, watch videos, or browse the web while fishing using the built-in web browser. Itâ€™s the perfect way to unwind.
